item.description:
RSVP's are closed for this event. Tickets sold out! If you have not purchased a ticket, there are no more spots left on the boat. Maybe next time!

Come aboard SoundWaters, a 80 foot schooner, for a relaxing journey on the waters of Long Island Sound. There is nothing like a two-hour sunset sail to refresh your soul.

The cruise ship departs at the Milford Boat Ramp, behind Milford Library at 6 pm and returns at 8 pm. NHC'ers are then free to enjoy the festival's Oyster Eve with a live outdoor performance by The Bernadettes, voted the best rhythm and blues band by the New Haven Advocate, as well as amusement park rides and the Dine-All-Eve featuring ala carte food, beer, wine and of course, oysters! Check out the events here:

http://www.milfordoysterfestival.com/images/stories/pdfs/eveflyer2012.pdf

The tall ship cruise is $45 and you must register IN ADVANCE. If you do not register and pay in advance, you will not be guaranteed a spot on the boat.

To register for the cruise, go to:

http://www.milfordoysterfestival.com/index.php/entertainment-a-events/harbor-activities/schooner-cruise

Scroll down and click the Buy Now button for FRIDAY Sunset Cruise 6:00pm-8:00pm: $45 All Ages. The cruise is BYOB or food.

For more information on registration, payment options, check-in times, directions, parking or refunds click the link above and scroll down.

 

Sound Waters will depart from the Milford Boat Ramp marked below with a blue/white anchor icon. The Milford Boat Ramp is located behind Milford Library and the Fowler Building on New Haven Avenue. Follow the road behind the library to the Milford Boat Ramp across from the children's rides. Parking is not available in the vicinity of the cruise departure. On Friday, parking is available at the Parson's Complex and various lots in Milford Center.
item.how_to_find_us: The ship isn't to big so you should be able to find Christina and Eric. Call them if necessary at : 860 518 6380
item.name: Sunset Cruise @ Milford Oyster Fest
